vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄρχιππος, -ου, ὁ
Archippus: Col.4:17, Phm 2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Col.4.17
§ Archippus, "master of the horse"
Archippus, (Proper name), Col. 4:17; Phlm. 2, inscr. and subscr.*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞基布 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "馴馬專家"
歌羅西教會一名基督徒教師
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚基布 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "驯马专家"
歌罗西教会一名基督徒教师
